channel.title: Flamable topics
channel.description: moparisthebest is a fine forum, and i hate to see it turning into a slum of leechers. Add a sticky, any posts with "help me with proxy plox"? "compiling error javac kthx?" posting bugs in "script requests" and "finished scripts" should be flamable. look in general chat, there are at least 2 proxy tutorials and yet someone asks "where can i get a proxy" "is it safe to proxy with main?" this forum isnt informing anymore, its getting information sucked out of it.

item.title: Flamable topics
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

your too nice, we need to beat the smart into em. at least get the aryan ones stickied, that sickens me. javac, compile, how to run it

Read full topic

item.title: Flamable topics
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I dont like flaming and most people dont like it, I try to delete it when I see it, and control as much as possible, Ill try to add some more information stickys, although they probably wont get read

Read full topic

To bad we can't just make people smart lol

item.title: Flamable topics
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

not ban, just call them fucking noobs and to use the god damn search bar

also a no .class posting property. compiling is one of the most basic things in java, and people cant even use the aryan-supplied compilers. makem learn or no scripts for them

Read full topic

item.title: Flamable topics
item.dc:creator: @marluxia marluxia
item.description:
@marluxia wrote:

Unfortunately theres not much you can do to stop it. All the people taking from the community no one putting anything back in it's the worst thing for a forum. I guess you could ban alot of people but that would piss people off lol and people still wouldn't be putting back in :S

Read full topic
